title: Vaishnavi Nakshi Pearl Haar - A Symphony of Tradition and Elegance
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This captivating Haar blends traditional design with a modern sensibility. The delicate floral motifs are encrusted with sparkling CZ stones, interspersed with ruby accents. Pearl drops add a touch of classic charm. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, making it ideal for any occasion.
occasions: or as a sophisticated statement piece for modern celebrations.
description: This Haar effortlessly combines classic South Indian design with contemporary elegance. The brilliant CZ stones offer exceptional sparkle, while the ruby accents add a pop of color. The lightweight construction and Hyderabadi polish ensure both comfort and lasting beauty. A timeless piece that will be treasured for generations.
